DOC.brief_summary: This project focus myomectomy patient reproductive age . The aim study molecular characteristic uterine fibroid characterize clinical effect surgical treatment . Patient series mainly retrospective consist individual undergone myomectomy Helsinki University Central Hospital ( HUCH ) 2009-2015 . In addition , investigator start prospective sample collection start October 2015 , collect sample myomectomies . Clinical data source include medical record , specific questionnaire quality life -questionnaire fill patient .
